system.description:
Monstrous humanoids are similar to humanoids, but with monstrous or animalistic features. They often have magical abilities as well.

Features: 8-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to total Hit Dice (as fighter); good Reflex and Will saves.

Traits: Monstrous humanoids eat, sleep, and breathe; proficient with simple weapons and any weapons mentioned in entry; darkvision 60 ft.
